items.name: Goku
items.description: The protagonist, known for his great power and friendly nature, sent to Earth to survive Freeza's destruction of his planet. Goku is dedicated to defending Earth, continually seeking to surpass his limits and protect his friends and family. His cheerful personality makes him a beloved hero.

items.name: Vegeta
items.description: Prince of the Saiyans, initially a villain, becomes Goku's rival and ally defending Earth. Vegeta is fiercely proud of his heritage and constantly pushes himself to compete with Goku. His journey from villain to hero is one of redemption, and he becomes a devoted family man.

items.name: Piccolo
items.description: Originally Goku's enemy, Piccolo evolves into a hero and mentor to Gohan. His wisdom, strength, and strategic mind make him crucial to the Z Fighters. Piccolo's bond with Gohan is strong, often acting as a surrogate father to him.

items.name: Bulma
items.description: A brilliant inventor, Goku’s close friend and Vegeta’s wife. She is instrumental in the search for Dragon Balls and creates many technological devices used by the Z Fighters. Her intelligence and resourcefulness often save the day.

items.name: Freezer
items.description: A galactic tyrant and main antagonist of the Frieza saga. Freeza is cruel, ruthless, and powerful, ruling vast territories of the universe. His ambition for power drives much of the conflict in the Dragon Ball series, remaining one of Goku's greatest foes.

items.name: Zarbon
items.description: A loyal and powerful warrior serving Freeza. Zarbon is known for his beauty and brutal strength in combat. He has a transformation that significantly increases his power, making him one of Freeza’s most trusted fighters.

items.name: Dodoria
items.description: A brutal enforcer under Freeza's command. Dodoria is known for his savage nature and cruelty in battle, showing little mercy to enemies. Despite his brute strength, he is often outclassed by the more skilled warriors in Freeza’s army.

items.name: Ginyu
items.description: Leader of Freeza's elite mercenaries, known for his body-switching ability. Captain Ginyu is a proud and skilled warrior who leads the Ginyu Force with precision. His technique makes him a unique and dangerous opponent in battle.

items.name: Celula
items.description: A bio-android created by Dr. Gero’s computer, seeking to absorb others for perfection. Celula’s quest drives him to absorb powerful fighters, and his ability to regenerate makes him nearly indestructible. His intelligence makes him one of the most dangerous villains.

items.name: Gohan
items.description: Goku's eldest son, a hybrid Saiyan and human. He becomes a key defender of Earth, though his gentle nature often makes him reluctant to fight. When pushed, Gohan demonstrates some of the most incredible power in the series.

items.name: Krillin
items.description: Goku’s best friend and a skilled martial artist, known for his bravery. Despite being a human among powerful Saiyans, Krillin has proven himself countless times in battle. His determination and courage make him a trusted member of the Z Fighters.

items.name: Tenshinhan
items.description: A disciplined martial artist and ally to Goku and the Z Fighters. Tenshinhan's serious demeanor reflects his commitment to self-improvement and protecting Earth. His techniques, such as the Tri-Beam, demonstrate his unique abilities.

items.name: Yamcha
items.description: Former desert bandit who becomes a martial artist and Z Fighter. While often outmatched, Yamcha's loyalty to his friends and fighting spirit are unshakable. He has a cheerful personality and remains a valued member of the Z Fighters.

items.name: Chi-Chi
items.description: Goku's wife and mother of Gohan and Goten, known for her strict parenting. While not a fighter, Chi-Chi is a strong-willed mother who fiercely protects her family. Her concerns for Gohan's education often clash with Goku's carefree attitude.

items.name: Gotenks
items.description: Fusion of Goten and Trunks, known for immense power and playful personality. Gotenks is a formidable fighter and a mischievous prankster, often taking battles less seriously than he should.

items.name: Trunks
items.description: Son of Vegeta and Bulma, a skilled warrior and Goten’s best friend. Trunks is brave and intelligent, inheriting both his father's fighting skills and his mother's sharp mind. He shows determination beyond his years.

items.name: Master Roshi
items.description: A legendary martial arts master and mentor to Goku and the Z Fighters. Known for his eccentric personality, Master Roshi has trained some of Earth's most powerful warriors. Despite his age, he continues to surprise everyone with his abilities.

items.name: Bardock
items.description: Goku's father, a low-class Saiyan warrior who fought to protect his race. Bardock's defiance against Freeza marked him as one of the first to challenge his empire, leaving a legacy as Goku's greatest adversary.

items.name: Raditz
items.description: Goku’s brother, who comes to Earth to recruit him for the Saiyan army. Raditz's arrival began conflicts that changed Goku's life forever, revealing Goku’s Saiyan heritage.

items.name: Nappa
items.description: A high-ranking Saiyan warrior who accompanies Vegeta to Earth. Nappa's brutal combat style and towering physique make him a fearsome adversary, signaling the threat from the Saiyan race.

items.name: Broly
items.description: A legendary Super Saiyan with immense power, featured as a major antagonist in several movies. Broly’s raw strength is unparalleled, and his uncontrollable rage makes him nearly unstoppable. His tragic backstory has made him a fan-favorite.

items.name: Majin Buu
items.description: An ancient creature of immense power, capable of endless regeneration and destruction. Majin Buu's playful nature hides devastating capabilities. His ability to transform into dangerous forms makes him formidable for the Z Fighters.

items.name: Beerus
items.description: The God of Destruction from Universe 7, responsible for maintaining balance by destroying planets. Beerus is feared and respected throughout the multiverse due to his immense power. When serious, he can obliterate entire galaxies.

items.name: Whis
items.description: An angel and Beerus’ attendant, one of the most powerful beings in Universe 7. Whis is responsible for training Beerus and keeping him in check, often showing a carefree side. His abilities far surpass those of most gods.

items.name: Jiren
items.description: A member of the Pride Troopers and one of the strongest mortals in the multiverse. Jiren’s overwhelming power and stoic personality make him feared and respected. His past drives his relentless pursuit of strength.

items.name: Zeno
items.description: The Omni-King, the supreme ruler of all multiverses with the ability to erase entire universes. Despite his childlike appearance, Zeno holds ultimate power over all realities, and even gods tremble before him.
